document_data.name: Esmar Torlath
document_data.mainbody: '''Esmar Torlath ''' was a son of the [[Amn]]ian [[Torlath]] dynasty who was killed shortly after birth.
document_data.Relationships: Esmar was the son of King [[Esmel Torlath IV|Esmel IV]].
document_data.History:
Esmar was only a newborn baby in [[696 DR]] when his aunt [[Leluia Torlath|Leluia]]'s husband [[Arbas]] killed him and all the other male Torlaths in Amn, including Esmar's father Esmel IV.

During the civil war in Amn following [[1276 DR]], various factions produced unlikely heirs descended from long-lost branches of the royal families. One such pretender was the so-called Prince [[Elashar Torlath]], descendant of Esmar, who appeared during the [[Great Amnian Trade War]] of [[1333 DR]] according to the manipulations of [[Harlo Ongalor]].
